Topic.Title: How to  put  a player in bed?

Posts.EditableText: How do I put a player in bed? In bed?
Posts.HTML: How do I put a player in bed? In bed?

Posts.EditableText: I suggest you play through the [tutorial](http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/) (first item on the documentation page) to gain an understanding as these are very basic to all adventures. Once you have done this, feel free to ask for further help.
